description:
This course is going to show you a revolutionary new way to leverage the power of using Live Google Hangouts to build your email list, attract raving fans, sell more of your products and services, and repurpose your content into multiple online mediums.

At the end of this course, you will understand how to set up a Live Google Hangout like a pro and have a clear plan of action for how you can start using Hangouts in your business today!

This course is short and to the point. You can consume it in one sitting and be taking action that evening. The PDFs for each chapter will allow you quick reference to the content at any time.

During this video and PDF course you will receive:

  • Over an hour of video content that gets straight to the point, no fluff here
  • Nearly 50 pages of PDF slides that you can reference for quick reading
  • The Live Hangouts 101 Guidebook (17 pages)
  • Webinar Jam Tutorial and Mastery Guide (8 pages)

If you are an online business owner looking to build your following, host live webinars, and sell more of your products and services, learning to use Live Hangouts is a must!
title: Google Hangouts That Convert- Hangouts for Online Business
